values: The Supremacy of God in the Use of Your MindThe Supremacy of God in the Use of Your Mind

The supremacy of God in the life of the mind is manifested by the conscious, worshipful experience of God’s supremacy in the use of one’s mind together with an intentional display it in one’s mental work.The supremacy of God in the life of the mind is manifested by the conscious, worshipful experience of God’s supremacy in the use of one’s mind together with an intentional display it in one’s mental work.
